info.title: CATALOG API

get.description: Retrieve all products from the given shop.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the desired shop.

get.description: Retrieve schedules from the given shop.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the desired shop.

put.description: Update schedules from the given shop.

id.description: Id of schedule that you want to update
